thread.title: SSI Appoints Jeff Miller as Chief Product Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: SSI Appoints Jeff Miller as Chief Product Officer
text:
MOBILE, Ala.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- SSI, a leading provider of solutions that increase the accuracy and velocity of data exchange among healthcare providers and payers, has appointed Jeff Miller as Chief Product Officer (CPO). A seasoned executive with a strong record of developing and growing new business in the healthcare and information technology space, Miller brings a breadth of strategic and managerial experience to SSI.
As CPO for SSI, Miller is responsible for understanding market dynamics, trends and requirements, as well as identifying new product opportunities that help customers overcome challenges. He will help bring new products to market, managing them through their entire lifecycle, and be tasked with developing business relationships to enhance the SSI portfolio and the value it brings to customers.
“We are excited to have a seasoned veteran like Jeff join the leadership at SSI,” said Jimmy Lyons, CEO and President of SSI. “He has proven his ability to create and grow successful business teams and partnerships, build and deploy effective communication platforms, manage the needs of various stakeholders, and adapt to changing needs of organizations large and small. We look forward to harnessing his talents to serve the evolving needs of the healthcare market going forward.”
Miller has broad experience working with both healthcare providers and payers to optimize communications and harness data in new, productive ways. He previously served as CEO of the North Carolina Health Information Exchange (NCHIE), as well as in consulting and technology-focused roles with DXC Technology, SureScripts LLC, Hewlett-Packard Company, Capgemini, The Advisory Board Company, Deloitte Consulting and IBM.
He holds an MBA from Duke University’s Fuqua School of Business, a BA in both Computer Science and Economics from Northwestern University, and he has served as a board member and advisor for numerous healthcare and IT organizations.
About SSI:
SSI delivers solutions that increase the accuracy and velocity of data exchange among healthcare providers and payers, with the highest levels of security. A privately held company since its founding 30 years ago, SSI is singularly focused on the healthcare industry. SSI’s commitment to our clients’ success is evident with nearly 50% of our clients relying on SSI solutions for 10 years or more. Our revenue cycle, EDI gateway, and clinical data interoperability solutions are among the best in the industry and help our clients effectively and efficiently manage their clinical and claims data. Learn how we can help you at www.thessigroup.com .
